duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and support Oracle databases, including installation, upgrade, configuration, and troubleshooting.
Expertly manage Backup and Recovery solutions with RMAN and logical backups.
Conduct advanced performance tuning and analysis using Oracle performance tools.
Apply latest DB new features to provide measurable value on client's systems.
Experience with Exadata deployments, managing, and maintaining Exadata/OCI environments.
Knowledge and experience of Oracle Cloud Infrastructure and Exadata Cloud Service.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or equivalent (Master's preferred)
